item.title: CV
item.description: Education Here is a list of some projects that I took part in. PostgreSQL Contributions during the summer internship in Postgres Professional: Generator of random numbers from Zipfian distribution for pgbench Command to show access methods info Louis Service for processing images and uploading them to S3 storage. Language: GoLang Repo: KazanExpress/louis

item.title: Talks
item.description: Here is a list of talks I gave in different conferences and meetups: CI/CD for golang projects with drone.io Avito.Tech meetup in Kazan, 2020 Drone.io #101 Golang Meetup in Yoshkar-Ola, 2020 Configuring CI/CD for IaC Innopolis DevOps Meetup, 2022 Link to timecode: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bZXlizneB8U&t=2840s IaC with Terraform and drone.io YandexScale in Moscow, 2022 Link to timecode: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5wZ2G5idK1w&t=2318s
